name: ANDROID_GAMER
comment: Wonderful experience in mobile devices, but when it comes to TV I'm disappointed. First of, please add a sort button within playlist in Android TV i need to scroll so the way down to get newly added songs and when i search songs, there is no change in the screen as seen in mobile. When i press enter then only results are shown. Please add the feature that when i search simultaneously results are shown word by word.
